name: Color Drop (By iMancha)
storyline:
Color Drop is an arcade style game where you the 'droplet' have to tap to jump, perfectly time your drop with skill to pass through the matching color or obstacle, and collect stars to unlock new game modes: 
 
● Crazy Obstacle Mode 
● Insane Obstacle Mode 
 
Remember, patience and timing are your two best friends.
